verses.text: Ex vuk'tac ex vanab', ayic ix in ek' valel yab'ixal Dios te yel d'a e cal, manh jelanoc ix vutej in loloni. Manhoc juntzanh lolonel syal eb' jelan ix ek' valeli.
Yujto ayic ix in ek' d'ayex, ix in na to malaj junocxo tas svak' eyojtaquejeli. Anhej val yab'ixal Jesucristo ix ek' valel d'ayex, to ix cham d'a te' culus.
Ayic ix in ek' ta', icha junoc anima malaj yelk'ochi, icha chi' ix vutej in b'a. Ix in ib'xiq'ue yuj xivelal.
Ix in nib'ej to manhoc in ix ex in montej. Yuj chi' ayic ix in lolon eyed'oc, ix valan eyab'i. Manh jelanoc ix vutej in b'a ayic ix valan d'ayex. A Yespíritu Dios, montannac ex yed' spoder Dios chi'.
Yuj chi', manh yujoc sjelanil anima van eyak'anoch Dios d'a e k'ool ticnaic, palta yujnhej spoder chi'.

Palta axo d'a eb' creyente tek'anxo, ay jun jelanil svalel d'a scal eb'. A jun jelanil svalel chi', manh yicoc yolyib'anhq'uinal tic, manhoc pax d'a eb' yajalil yolyib'anhq'uinal tic scoti, yujto a juntzanh tic, toxo ol lajvoqueloc.

Palta a jun jelanil svalel chi', aton sjelanil Dios. A jun jelanil chi', max nachajel yuj eb' anima, yujto k'ub'ab'ilel d'a eb'. A Dios najinacxocan jun tic yuj co vach'iloc, ayic manto sb'o yolyib'anhq'uinal tic.
Malaj junoc eb' yajal snachajel jun tic yuuj. Q'uinaloc tato ix nachajel yuj eb', maj am yak'och Cajal Jesús eb' te nivan yelk'och d'a te' culus.

Palta syal d'a Slolonel Dios Tz'ib'ab'ilcan icha tic: Ay val jun tas sb'onaccan Dios, yic syak' d'a eb' xajanani. Manta junoc mach tz'ilan jun chi', manta pax mach tz'ab'ani. Malaj pax junoc mach syal snaaneli, xchicani.
Palta a Dios tz'ak'an cojtaquejel juntzanh tic yuj Yespíritu. Yujto a Yespíritu chi' tz'ojtacanel masanil tasi. A juntzanh tas yic Dios, max nachajel yuj anima, palta axo Yespíritu Dios chi' yojtac.
A d'a scal anima, malaj junoc mach ojtannac tas yaj spensar junocxo anima. Yujto munil cojtac junjun onh tas ay d'a co pensar. Icha pax chi' Dios, anhej Yespíritu ojtannac tas sna'a.

A onh tic, manhoclaj espíritu yic yolyib'anhq'uinal tic co chanac. Palta a jun Espíritu cotnac d'a Dios, a jun chi' co chanac. Yuj chi', a juntzanh tas syak' Dios d'ayonh yuj svach'k'olal, snachajel cuuj.

A juntzanh lolonel scal tic, manh yujoc co jelanil snachajel cuuj. Palta a Yespíritu Dios tz'ak'an nachajel cuuj. A juntzanh k'ayb'ub'al tic, yic Yespíritu Dios chi'. Yuj chi', a eb' b'aj ayochi, aton eb' syal co k'ayb'ani.

A eb' manh ayococh Yespíritu Dios d'ay, max yak'och juntzanh k'ayb'ub'al tic eb' d'a sk'ool, yujto malaj tz'och d'a eb'. Max yal-laj scomon nachajel juntzanh tic yuj eb', yujto anhej Yespíritu Dios chi' tz'ak'an cojtaquejeli.
Palta a eb' b'aj ayxo och Yespíritu Dios chi', syal sch'olb'itan tas yaj masanil tastac eb', tato vach' d'a yichanh Dios, mato maay. Palta malaj junoc anima syal sch'olb'itan tas yaj eb'.
Yujto tz'ib'yajcan d'a Slolonel Dios: ¿Tom ay val junoc mach ojtannac tas sna Dios Cajal? ¿Toc ay junoc mach ol yal sk'ayb'ani? xchicani. Palta a onhxo tic, ayxo och spensar Cristo d'ayonh.
